input.sentences: my parents invited us to a picnic at their house .
we were all having a nice time visiting .
i showed off my new tattoo .
both of my sisters got similar tattoos when they found out about mine !
output.sentences: Today we were invited to our parents picnic.
We had a fun time visiting and seeing my niece.
She even gave us a tattoo.
My sisters got similar tattoos to mine.
Our sisters were so surprised at how everything turned out.
